item.title: Deploy Hugo and Further
item.author: Author
item.description: Deploy Hugo and Further The following operations is based on the post, “Hugo With LoveIt Theme Configuration”, which requires you have already installed and config both Hugo and LoveIt theme. 1. Deploy Hugo on Github Assume you have already got a Github account. Create a Github Repository, name this repository as yourgithubname.github.io. Open your terminal, and cd to your blog folder. Run following command lines: 1 2 3 4 5

item.title: Hugo and LoveIt Theme Config
item.author: Author
item.description: Hugo With LoveIt Theme Configuration This post is for MacOS and Homebrew User 0. Install Homebrew 1 ruby -e "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/master/install)" 1. Install Hugo 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 # Install hugo by homebrew brew install hugo # Make sure that you install hugo successfully hugo version # Cd to Desktop directory cd Desktop # Create new hugo site in Desktop directory hugo new site
